titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky vs. John Jones and Wesley Jones, Judgment
CWG8811

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
Commonwealth of Ky Plf
vs } Copy Judgment
John Jones & Wesley Jones Deft

Came the Defendents & plead not guilty to the charges prefered agst them & issue being joined, came the following Jury (to wit) Richard Liss -- A Cain M T Stephens Spencer Paul -- Conner John Stephens Thos SpilmanStephens, Lewis Stephens, A Jillims Elias Ross Benj Wilshire Rillarshall Charles Oliver who after being duly sworn returned the following verdict. We the Jury find Defendets guilty & assess the fine at thirty Dollars each, --
Wherefore it is ordered & adjudged that the Plaintiff receive of the Defendents thirty Dollars each & crsts cstscosts herin expended -- May 20 1863.
L Shaw P J K C C
